DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the Technology-based Eye Care Services (TECS) protocol to the standard face to face ophthalmologic exam.
DOC.detailed_description: Patients will sign informed consent to enter the one visit study. They will undergo the study protocol and then see the face to face physician on the same day.
DOC.criteria: Patient at the Atlanta VA Medical Center (VAMC) New Comprehensive eye clinic Known acute or chronic ocular issues
